Renewed Nuclear Testing in… the U.S.? Link: https://www.armscontrolwonk.com/archive/1209485/renewed-nuclear-testing-in-the-u-s/

by ACW Podcast Link: https://www.armscontrolwonk.com/archive/author/podcast/ | May 29, 2020 | No Comments Link: https://www.armscontrolwonk.com/archive/1209485/renewed-nuclear-testing-in-the-u-s/#respond

Founded in 2004 by Jeffrey Lewis , Arms Control Wonk was the first blog on arms control, disarmament and nonproliferation. It has since been a home to everything that is "too wonky or obscene" for publication about nuclear weapons. The site now features thirty-plus contributors with an archive of over three thousand articles .

Latest Podcast

John Hudson and Paul Sonne at the Washington Post broke the story that Trump administration officials have discussed conducting additional nuclear tests in the United States.  Jeffrey and Anne discuss why this is a bad idea, how this would disproportionately benefit U.S. nuclear competitors, and the primarily political (not technical) utility of a “rapid” nuclear

About

Founded in 2004 by Jeffrey Lewis Link: /archive/author/jeffrey/ , Arms Control Wonk was the first blog on arms control, disarmament and nonproliferation. It has since been a home to everything that is "too wonky or obscene" for publication about nuclear weapons. The site now features Link: http://www.armscontrolwonk.com/archive/605638/acw4/ thirty-plus contributors Link: /authors/ with an archive of over three thousand articles Link: /articles/ .

Latest Podcast

John Hudson and Paul Sonne at the Washington Post broke the story that Trump administration officials have discussed conducting additional nuclear tests in the United States. 

Jeffrey and Anne discuss why this is a bad idea, how this would disproportionately benefit U.S. nuclear competitors, and the primarily political (not technical) utility of a “rapid” nuclear

test. 

Support us over at Patreon.com/acwpodcast!
